name: Platformer Noise
description: In the most difficult times, there is only hope that moral values are still alive in the hearts of people. It is extremely difficult to maintain humanity when the world around is collapsing. The valiant knight, on the orders of his overlord, goes to the castle to collect the toll. A difficult path awaits him. Obstacles in the way will put his moral principles in doubt. Will he be able to remain true to himself and survive, or will the disease force him to deviate from some commandments.
